title: Is there anything related about lyrics and lyricists? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m not sure what you mean here. Other than the answer that has already been given I would add that many lyricists write in a certain style while some others are much wider ranging (so you might spot some lyrics as being by a particular writer just because you know their style) some write for themselves, some write songs for others, or both. It’s very varied as it’s a creative thing.
Yes a major connection unthought of seemingly. One you cannot seem to guess get ready for it. Lyrics are written by lyricists not only that but lyricists write lyrics.
